channel.title: East Portland Freeway on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in East Portland Freeway on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-26 West at I-205 North
item.description: US-26 West at I-205 North in Portland.

item.title: I-205 North - Exit 27
item.description: I-205 north approaching Exit 27 - WA-14/Vancouver/Camas. The milemarkers and exit numbers along I-205 do not reset back to zero when crossing into Washington. They continue on the Oregon numbering scheme. Although this is a Washington exit, this sign is still within Oregon.

item.title: I-205 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Last distance marker on I-205 north in Oregon. Distance to WA-14, I-5, and Seattle.

item.title: I-205 North - Leaving Portland
item.description: Leaving Portland on I-205 north, on bridge over Columbia River.

item.title: NE Airport Way at I-205 North
item.description: NE Airport Way at I-205 North to Seattle.

item.title: I-205 North - Exit 22
item.description: I-205 north at Exit 22 - I-84/US-30 East/The Dalles. I-205 continues north to Portland Airport and Seattle.

item.title: I-205 North - Exit 22
item.description: I-205 North at Exit 22 - I-84/US-30 East/The Dalles.

item.title: I-205 North - Exit 21B
item.description: I-205 north at Exit 21B - I-84/US-30 West/Portland.

item.title: I-205 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-205 north to the next three interchanges on I-205 north. Distance to I-84/US-30 West, I-84/US-30 East, and Sandy Blvd.

item.title: I-205 North - Exit 21B
item.description: I-205 north at Exit 21B - Glisan St.

item.title: I-205 North - Exits 20 and 21A
item.description: I-205 north approaching Exit 20 - Washington St./Stark St. Approaching Exit 21A - Glisan St.

item.title: I-205 North - Exit 19
item.description: I-205 north at Exit 19 - US-26/Powell Blvd./Division St.

item.title: I-205 North - Exit 19 and Next Exits
item.description: I-205 north approaching Exit 9 - US-26/Powell St./Division St. Use Exit 19 for Gresham and the DMV. Distance marker for two approaching Exits - Glisan St. (Exit 21A) and I-84/US-30 West/Portland (Exit 21B).

item.title: I-205 North - Exit 17
item.description: I-205 north at Exit 17 - Foster Road.

item.title: I-205 North - Entering Portland and Multnomah County
item.description: Entering Portland on I-205 North. Also entering Multnomah County.

item.title: I-205 North - Exit 16
item.description: I-205 north at Exit 16 - Johnson Creek Blvd.

item.title: I-205 North Approaching Exit 17
item.description: I-205 North approaching Exit 17 - Foster Road.

item.title: I-205 North - Exit 14
item.description: I-205 north at Exit 14 - Sunnybrook Blvd./Sunnyside Road.

item.title: I-205 North - Exit 13
item.description: I-205 north at Exit 13 - OR-213/OR-224/82nd Ave/Milwaukee. Continue north on I-205 for The Dalles (via I-84) and Seattle.

item.title: I-205 North Approaching Exit 13
item.description: I-205 North approaching Exit 13 - OR-213 North/OR-224 West/82nd Ave./Milwaukie.

item.title: I-205 North - Exit 12
item.description: I-205 north at Exit 12 - OR-212/OR-224 East/Estacada/Mt. Hood.

item.title: I-205 North - Exit 11
item.description: I-205 north at Exit 11 - Gladstone/DMV.

item.title: I-205 North Approaching Exit 11
item.description: I-205 north approaching Exit 11 - Gladstone/DMV. OR-213 joins I-215 north to Clackamas.

item.title: I-205 North - Exit 10
item.description: I-205 north at Exit 10 - OR-213 South/Oregon City/Molalla. OR-213 north joins I-205 north to Clackamas.

item.title: I-205 North - Exits 9 and 10
item.description: I-205 north at Exit 9 - OR-99E/Downtown Oregon City/Gladstone. Approaching Exit 10 - OR-213 South/Oregon City/Molalla.

item.title: I-205 North - Exit 9
item.description: I-205 north approaching Exit 9 - OR-99E/Downtown Oregon City/Gladstone.

item.title: I-205 North - Exit 8
item.description: I-205 north at Exit 8 - OR-43/West Linn/Lake Oswego.

item.title: I-205 North - Exit 6
item.description: I-205 north at Exit 6 - 10th St.

item.title: I-205 North Approaching Exit 6
item.description: I-205 north approaching Exit 6 - 10th St.

item.title: I-205 North - Exit 3
item.description: I-205 north at Exit 3 - Stafford Road/Lake Oswego.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 288
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 288 - I-205 North/Oregon City. I-5 continues north to Portland. I-205 is the eastern loop around Portland. Seattle bound traffic, or traffic bound for I-84 east might find I-205 faster than going through downtown Portland.

item.title: I-5 North Approaching Exit 288
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 288 - I-205 North/Oregon City. I-5 continues north to Portland. I-205 is the beltway around the east side of the Portland metropolitan area.

item.title: I-5 North - Exits 286 and 288
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 286 - Elligsen Road/Boones Ferry Road. Approaching Exit 288 - I-205 North/Oregon City.

item.title: I-5 South - Exits 289 and 286
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 289 - Nyberg St./Tualatin-Sherwood Road. Approaching Exit 286 - I-205 North/West Linn/Oregon City.

item.title: I-5 South Approaching Exit 288
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 288 - I-205 North/West Linn/Oregon City. I-205 is the beltway around the east side of the Portland metropolitan area. I-205 rejoins I-5 again north of Vancouver, Washington.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 9
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 9 - I-205/Salem/Seattle. Continue west on I-84/US-30 for Portland.

item.title: I-84 West Approaching Exit 9
item.description: I-84/US-30 west approaching Exit 9 - I-205/Seattle/Salem. Continue west on I-84 for Portland.

item.title: I-84 West Approaching Exit 9
item.description: I-84/US-30 west approaching Exit 9 - I-205/Seattle/Salem. Use right lanes to continue west on I-84/US-30 to Portland.

item.title: Distance Marker on I-205 North
item.description: Next 3 exits on I-205 north: I-84 West, I-84 East, and Sandy Blvd.

item.title: I-205 North Exit 12
item.description: I-205 north approaching Exit 12, OR-212/OR-224/Estacada/Mt. Hood.

item.title: I-205 North Exit 13
item.description: I-205 north at Exit 13, OR-213/OR-224/82nd Ave/Milwaukee.

item.title: I-205 North Exit 19
item.description: I-205 north approaching Exit 9, Powell St. Overhead for next 2 exits, Glisan St and I-84.

item.title: I-205 North Exit 21B
item.description: I-205 north approaching Exit 21B, I-84/US-30 West/Portland, 1/2 mile.

item.title: I-205 North Exit 22
item.description: I-205 north approaching Exit 22, I-84/US-30 East/The Dalles, 1 1/4 miles.

item.title: I-205 North Exit 22
item.description: I-205 north at Exit 22, I-84/US-30 East/The Dalles, and I-205 overhead to Portland Airport/Seattle.

item.title: I-205 North Exit 23AB
item.description: I-205 north at Exit 23A, US-30 Bypass East/Sandy Blvd.

item.title: I-205 North Exit 8
item.description: I-205 north at Exit 8, OR-43/West Linn/Lake Oswego

item.title: I-205 North Exit 9
item.description: I-205 north approaching Exit 9, OR-99E/Downtown Oregon City/Gladstone, 3/4 mile.

item.title: I-5 North Exit 286/Exit 288
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 286, Stafford/N. Wilsonville, approaching I-205.

item.title: I-5 North Exit 288
item.description: I-5 north to Tigard and Portland at Exit 288, I-205/To I-84/The Dalles/Seattle.
